data.title: Sing it Loud
data.meta_description: "Sing it loud for all to hear." "Sing it Loud" was the original piece that inspired the creation of the more recent print...
data.text:
"Sing it loud for all to hear."

"Sing it Loud" was the original piece that inspired the creation of the more recent print "Sit & Listen". I always felt the guitar playing fox needed a buddy, so along with the accordion playing bear they form a rollicking, foot stomping, mountain loving musical duo. I always envisioned the two of them hung side by side.

The original artwork is a hand carved linoleum block and was printed using a wooden spoon.

Screen printed by the fine folks over at Ink Lounge Creative.

https://inkloungecreative.com

- - -

Edition: 50

All prints signed & numbered

- - -

18" x 24"

3-color screen print

- - -

PLEASE NOTE: Combined shipping cannot be included when ordered with anything mailed flat such as Memories of the Mattertal, The Angry Sea or the two smaller giclees. Those have to mailed separately. Thank you for understanding.
